thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: ‘Murdered’ Russian Journalist Arkady Babchenko Is Alive, Explains Sting Operation to Lure Assassins

author: James Marson
title: ‘Murdered’ Russian Journalist Arkady Babchenko Is Alive, Explains Sting Operation to Lure Assassins
text:
A Russian journalist and Kremlin critic reported killed late Tuesday appeared alive and well Wednesday to describe his part in what Ukrainian officials called an operation to catch a would-be murderer.
Arkady Babchenko emerged at a news conference in Kiev ostensibly called by Ukrainian officials to discuss his killing. Police officials had reported late Tuesday that Mr. Babchenko, 41 years old, had been gunned down at the door of his Kiev apartment.
...
